kalimat_inggris: His face was swollen because of being stung by a bee

kata_indonesia: menemui titik temu, sepakat, sampai pada kesimpulan

kata_indonesia: istilah untuk menyatakan orang yang dalam keadaan susah payah menjinjing sesuatu yang berat dan besar

kalimat_besemah: Dusun Matang Bange, sangkan bename luq itu li jeme di kale kalu mbuat pematang besaq libagh, tinggi pule, mangke dikateka bange
kalimat_indonesia: Dusun Matang Bange dinamakan demikian oleh orang dahulu karena bila membuat galangan besar, lebar, dan tinggi, maka disebut bange atau tolol
kalimat_inggris: Matang Bange village, it was called so by the ancestor because the villagers always made big, wide, and high dyke, that was the cause why they were called stupid

kata_inggris: a part of tools for softening/blending the spices

kalimat_besemah: Diq sangke aku dig sangke, Tempedaq bebuah nangke, Diq sangke aku dig sangke, Awaq gi budaq mangke lah jande
kalimat_indonesia: Tak mengira saya tak mengira, Cempedak berbuah nangka, Tak mengira saya tak mengira, Masih muda tapi sudah janda
kalimat_inggris: I didn't guess, I didn't guess that the inside of cempedak is jackfruit, I didn't guess, I didn't she is still young but she is a widow

kalimat_indonesia: Dia mengira kami membicarakan dia padahal kami tidak bicara apa-apa
kalimat_inggris: He thought we were talking about him whereas we said nothing
